lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Daniel Lee, an analyst at Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc, said that although Sosnoff's relatively low bid may attract other suitors willing to pay a higher price for Caesars, there is little likelihood that a competing bid would start a battle for the company.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A Caesars World spokesman said the company was declining comment on the Sosnoff move for the moment, but Caesars may issue a public statement after it has studied the offer.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: <MTS Acquisition Corp's> 28-dlr-per-share offering price for Caesars World Inc is thought to be much too low and is likely to attract other suitors for the hotel/casino company, industry analysts said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Daniel Lee, an analyst at Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc, said that although Sosnoff's relatively low bid may attract other suitors willing to pay a higher price for Caesars, there is little likelihood that a competing bid would start a battle for the company.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A Caesars World spokesman said the company was declining comment on the Sosnoff move for the moment, but Caesars may issue a public statement after it has studied the offer.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Acquisition Corp's> 28-dlr-per-share offering price for Caesars World Inc is thought to be much too low and is likely to attract other suitors for the hotel/casino company, industry analysts said.
